name: Tabs.Root
description: Flexible navigation tool with various modes and features.
description_zh: Flexible navigation tool with various modes and features.

activationMode.description:
The activation mode of the tabs. Can be `manual` or `automatic`
- `manual`: Tabs are activated when clicked or press `enter` key.
- `automatic`: Tabs are activated when receiving focus
activationMode.description_zh:
选项卡的激活模式。可以是 'manual' 或 'automatic'
- 'manual'：单击或按“enter”键时激活选项卡。
- 'automatic'：接收焦点时激活标签页

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

composite.description_zh: 选项卡是否为复合选项卡

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the tabs when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control the state of the tabs.
defaultValue.description_zh:
首次呈现选项卡时的初始值。
当您不需要控制选项卡的状态时使用。

deselectable.description: Whether the active tab can be deselected when clicking on it.
deselectable.description_zh: 单击活动选项卡时是否可以取消选择该选项卡。

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  trigger: string
  list: string
  content: string
  indicator: string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the tabs. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 选项卡中元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

loopFocus.description: Whether the keyboard navigation will loop from last tab to first, and vice versa.
loopFocus.description_zh: 键盘导航是否将从最后一个选项卡循环到第一个选项卡，反之亦然。

orientation.description:
The orientation of the tabs. Can be `horizontal` or `vertical`
- `horizontal`: only left and right arrow key navigation will work.
- `vertical`: only up and down arrow key navigation will work.
orientation.description_zh:
选项卡的方向。可以是 'horizontal' 或 'vertical'
- 'horizontal'：只有向左和向右箭头键导航有效。
- 'vertical'：只有向上和向下箭头键导航有效。

translations.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states
translations.description_zh: 指定标识辅助功能元素及其状态的本地化字符串

events.name: focusChange
events.description: Callback to be called when the focused tab changes
events.description_zh: 焦点选项卡更改时调用的回调

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: The callback fired when the model value changes.
events.description_zh: 当 model 值更改时触发回调。

events.name: valueChange
events.description: Callback to be called when the selected/active tab changes
events.description_zh: 选中/激活的 Tab 键发生变化时调用的回调
